data.title: Cultural Events — Alliance Francaise MSP
data.text:
The Art of Tridimensional Tapestry - Exposition d'Eddie Sulca

Travel with us to Perú, where the master weaver Eddie Sulca - one of the best exponents of the Peruvian contemporary weavings - comes from. Let yourself be amazed by his stunning three dimensional tapestries that seem to stand away from the wall!

View Event →

Ciné club - "Eugénie Grandet"

Join us at the Alliance Française for a Francophone movie night as we watch Eugénie Grandet, a historical drama based on the novel of the same name by famous nineteenth-century French novelist Honoré de Balzac!

View Event →

What is Literary Translation? - Talk with translator Sandra Smith

Did you ever wonder how books written in a foreign language end up on your library’s bookshelves? Come and meet Sandra Smith, a literary translator who has over 40 published works, who will explain the process and answer your questions.

View Event →

Paris Dining Club Moroccan Dinner

Are you dying to eat tagine? Join us at Paris Dining club for a wonderful Moroccan dinner crafted by chef Jamie Malone!

View Event →

Des fissures et des mots - Exhibition by Youyouyou Productions & Layla Metssitane

As part of our series of events "Entre la plume et la médaille", we are honored to host the digital exhibition of Layla Metssitane in our Grande Salle.

View Event →

Petit cours d'œnologie sur fond d'art

Come and join us at the Alliance for a course on wine led by David from Henry & Son. Learn about wine vocabulary, the world of wine, and more. Whether you're new to wine or looking to expand your knowledge, this class is a great opportunity to learn from an expert!

View Event →

Parlez-vous Business French ? - Learn about our New French for Business Classes! (Online) - September 3

Join us for an informational session about our new French Business courses for Intermediate level French speakers who use French in their workplace. This event will take place on Zoom.

View Event →

STILL - Exhibition by Mary Jo Hoffman

Join us for the "STILL" exhibition, showcasing Mary Jo Hoffman's STILL project, which reflects her profound admiration for nature's subtle, seasonal expressions.

View Event →

P'tit Déj - September 7

Join the Alliance Française for our monthly conversation coffee hour en français !

View Event →

Fall Open House

On Saturday, September 7 2024, join us at Alliance Française Mpls/St Paul to celebrate the start of Fall and all things new at AFMSP!

View Event →

P'tit café in Rochester - Sep 8

Join us at Café Aquì in Rochester for our monthly conversation coffee hour en français !

View Event →

Parlez-vous Business French ? - Learn about our New French for Business Classes! (Online) - September 9

Join us for an informational session about our new French Business courses for Intermediate level French speakers who use French in their workplace. This event will take place on Zoom.

View Event →

Les Navigateurs de la Littérature - Sep 11 - CANCELLED

Join Les Navigateurs de la Littérature, our monthly advanced book club, in reading the novel No et Moi, (2007) by French author, Delphine de Vigan.

View Event →

"A Season for That: Lost and Found in the Other Southern France" - A book presentation by Steve Hoffman with special guest Vincent Francoual

Join us at the Alliance for a presentation of Steve Hoffman’s first book: “A Season for That: Lost and Found in the Other Southern France”. The author will be discussing the inspiration, journey, and insights behind his latest work.

View Event →

Atelier-Rencontre with Layla Metssitane

Don't miss the opportunity to meet Layla Metssitane at the Alliance Française during the closing of her remarkable exhibition!

View Event →

Apéritif en Français - Sep 19

Join Alliance Française and the University Club of St. Paul on the third Thursday of each month in the club’s Member Bar for an apéritif en français.

View Event →

Fall Fashion Show Fundraiser

Join us for the 7th annual Fall Fashion Show, a fundraiser for Alliance Française Mpls/St Paul.

On Sunday, September 22, from 12 to 3 pm, the Alliance Française will host the 7th Annual Fall Fashion Fundraiser, this year bringing it to the American Swedish Institute in Minneapolis. This annual event is a unique opportunity to discover local designers and boutiques, enjoy a bruncheon and bid in a silent auction, and support our non-profit organization.

View Event →

Les Navigateurs de la Littérature - September 25

Join Les Navigateurs de la Littérature, our monthly advanced book club, in reading the novel L’amour comme un empire, (2023) by Lebanese-born Swiss author, Yasmine Char.

View Event →

“Paris Lost and Found” - Salon du livre opening by Scott Carpenter

We are honored to open our 2024 Salon du Livre with a presentation by Scott Carpenter of his new book, "Paris Lost & Found".

View Event →

Salon du livre

Alliance Française Mpls/St Paul is excited to host again this year, Salon du Livre, on Friday, September 27, from 6 pm to 8 pm & Saturday, September 28, from 10 am to 2 pm.

View Event →

Looking Out, Looking Beyond: Painting and Drawing by Ilene Krug Mojsilov

Join us for a poetic painting and drawing exhibition and discover wonderful landscapes and seascapes by artist Ilene Krug Mojsilov.

View Event →

P'tit Déj - October 5

Join the Alliance Française for our monthly conversation coffee hour en français !

View Event →

P'tit café in Rochester - Oct 6

Join us at Café Aquì in Rochester for our monthly conversation coffee hour en français !

View Event →

Les Navigateurs de la Littérature - Oct 9

Join Les Navigateurs de la Littérature, our monthly advanced book club, in reading the novel Mort aux cons, (2007) by French author, Carl Aderhold.

View Event →

Apéritif en Français - Oct 17

Join Alliance Française and the University Club of St. Paul on the third Thursday of each month in the club’s Member Bar for an apéritif en français.

View Event →

Translation Challenges: Albert Camus’s The Strange

There have been five published translations of this classic novel, the most recent by Sandra Smith in 2012. Come and meet her to discuss some of the literary and cultural challenges of translating this book, with comparisons of selected passages from all the translations.

View Event →

Ciné club - Les Algues vertes

Join us at the Alliance Française for a Francophone movie night as we watch Les Algues vertes, a thought-provoking film which delves into environmental and social issues with a powerful narrative. Don’t miss this eye-opening drama!

View Event →

Celebrate the Millennium of the Cathedral Notre-Dame de Chartres - Designing Chartres Cathedral: A Geometrical Perspective

Join us in la Grande Salle for the first event in a series celebrating the 1,000th Jubilee of Chartres Cathedral. Organized by The American Friends of Chartres, these lectures will be led by MJ McGregor, Ph.D.

View Event →

P'tit Déj - November 2

Join the Alliance Française for our monthly conversation coffee hour en français !

Join us at Café Aquì in Rochester for our monthly conversation coffee hour en français !

View Event →

Celebrate the Millennium of the Cathedral Notre-Dame de Chartres - Painting on Light: Renowned Medieval Stained-Glass Windows

Join us in la Grande Salle for the second event in a series celebrating the 1,000th Jubilee of Chartres Cathedral. Organized by The American Friends of Chartres, these lectures will be led by MJ McGregor, Ph.D.

View Event →

Les Navigateurs de la Littérature - Nov 13

Join Les Navigateurs de la Littérature, our monthly advanced book club, in reading the novel Le Suspendu de Conakry, (2018) by French author, Jean-Christophe Rufin.

View Event →

Celebrate the Millennium of the Cathedral Notre-Dame de Chartres - Time in the Cathedral

Join us in la Grande Salle for the last event in a series celebrating the 1,000th Jubilee of Chartres Cathedral. Organized by The American Friends of Chartres, these lectures will be led by MJ McGregor, Ph.D.

View Event →

Apéritif en Français - Nov 21

Join Alliance Française and the University Club of St. Paul on the third Thursday of each month in the club’s Member Bar for an apéritif en français.

View Event →

Ciné club - Mon légionnaire

Join us at the Alliance Française for a Francophone movie night as we watch Mon légionnaire, a poignant drama about the lives of the soldiers of the French Foriegn Legion.

View Event →

Marché de Noël

Join us on the first Saturday of December for our annual Marché de Noël ! Explore our collection of local artists and vendors in our Christmas Market, open from 9:30 am to 12:30 pm.

Join Les Navigateurs de la Littérature, our monthly advanced book club, in reading the novel Tout le bleu du ciel, (2019) by French author, Mélissa Da Costa.

Fête d'hiver - Winter celebration

Join Alliance Française for our annual winter celebration: Fête d’hiver!

Code couleur - Exhibition by Samuel Fleming

At the occasion of Black History Month, join us for a exhibition featuring pen drawings by artist Samuel Fleming and (re)discover important black figures from French history.
